item.title: Hardsurface Modeling Resources

item.title: Houdini Procedural Modeling Fundimentals
item.description: Because houdinis underlying architecture is procedural and node-based, creating systems for anything that follow that model is fairly straightforward as long as you understand how things work.

item.title: Modeling Techniques
item.description: Overview of Modeling Methodologies Polygonal modeling is a 3D computer graphics technique used to create 3D models by manipulating individual polygons (typically triangles, quads, or ngons) and their vertices.
